Our Business

Batching Plant

We have several type of Batching Plants such as Type Wet, Dry Type, Wet Mixer that comes from Japan and Germany and are using the semi automatic digital system, and full automatic computer system.

By using the Type Wet mixer may result a fast production capacity, homogeneity of the concrete mix and good quality, energy efficient and environmentally sound mixer truck.

We also have a mobile batching plants that can be placed at the project site and very fast in the installation process. Mobile Plant for projects with small to moderate volume in various regions of Indonesia. Capacity Mobile batching plants are small to medium to serve the needs of concrete for the project with concrete production speed 15-25 m3/hr.

Concrete Design

We provide a highly technical and personal services to ensure the quality produced in accordance with project specifications. We have experience in various projects with special specifications in getting the best quality, including :

  • High Performance Concrete

    Concrete with high quality for Building Multi-level, Airports, Ports, Dams, Bridges, etc.

  • Shotcrete

    Concrete fired by way of casting under pressure using a feeder or a gun on the tunnel wall or retaining wall.

  • Precast Concrete

    Concrete with concrete Release rate is rapid, such as for factories, piles, slabs, rigid pavement, etc.

  • Normal Concrete

    Concrete with a quality standard or the common on many projects with quality as required.
